glsa.title: Pygments: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: Pygments is vulnerable to remote code execution if an attacker is allowed to specify the font name.

background.p: Pygments is a generic syntax highlighter suitable for use in code hosting, forums, wikis or other applications that need to prettify source code.

description.p: A vulnerability in FontManagerâ€™s _get_nix_font_path function allows shell metacharacters to be passed in a font name.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Pygments users should upgrade to the latest version:
